name: Doctor Who Game Data File
summary: File used by Doctor Who: The Adventure Games, a computer game that follows the Doctor Who BBC television series, which broadcasts in the United Kingdom (UK); contains 3D model data, such as 3D scenes, maps, and rooms; used for rendering 3D visual data in the game.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: BBC Doctor Who: The Adventure Games
